table_caption: Demographic characteristics of children who were included in the baseline structural, resting state (rs) functional magnetici resonance imaging (fMRI) and task fMRI linear elastic net regression analyses. The means, standard deviation (SD) and the range or sample size and percent are presented below. BMI z-score and percentiles were calculated using the CDC standards for age-sex-weight-height-specific cut offs (Kuczmarski et al., 2000). BMI = Body Mass Index; Kg = kilograms; cm = centimeters; HS = High school; GED = Generalized Education Degree. EN-back = Emotional N-back; MID = monetary incentive delay; SST = stop signal task.
